Title: Relates to contracts to provide food services at transportation facilities and rest areas owned and operated by certain public authorities
Summary: Requires that food services at transportation facilities and rest areas owned and operated by certain public authorities remain open seven days a week.
LawCode: Add ยง390, Pub Auth L; amd Art 4, ยง1 of Chap 154 of 1921
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law and chapter 154 of the laws of 1921, relating to the port authority of New York and New Jersey, in relation to contracts to provide food services at authority owned and operated transportation facilities and rest areas
